subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: That music you hear when you close your eyes is this season’s first true stirrings of the Champions League anthem. The final playoff rounds begin this week, and Andrew Das tells you what to watch.
snippet: That music you hear when you close your eyes is this season’s first true stirrings of the Champions League anthem. The final playoff rounds begin this week, and Andrew Das tells you what to watch.
